doc:
Stephen Stucker https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stephen_Stucker 0 Stephen Stucker (July 2, 1947 – April 13, 1986) was an American actor, known for portrayals of bizarre, larger-than-life characters, notably the manic control-room worker Johnny in the early 1980s Airplane! movies and the crossdressing, rubber-penis-waving stenographer in the courtroom sequence of 1977's The Kentucky Fried Movie. Stephen_Stucker ( July_2_,_1947 – April_13_,_1986 ) was an_American_actor , known for portrayals of bizarre_,_larger-than-life_characters , notably the_manic_control-room_worker_Johnny in the_early_1980s_Airplane ! movies and the_crossdressing_,_rubber-penis-waving_stenographer in the_courtroom_sequence of 1977 's The_Kentucky_Fried_Movie .
